level.heading: Origination of registration in beneficiary form.
level.text: A security, whether evidenced by certificate or account, is registered in beneficiary form when the registration includes a designation of a beneficiary to take the ownership at the death of the owner or the deaths of all multiple owners.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following ยง 19-601.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 304 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act). See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
